name: May HM 7 Happy Lunar New Year
name_original: May HM 7 Happy Lunar New Year
description:
Happy Lunar New Year! It is time to celebrate, greet your family and friends, and get your red pocket money!

up down left right arrow to move.         Space to interact

Procedural Generation Toy assignment: 

generated houses will not be next to each other

headphone for the best experience
